name: Linux - Startup Diagnostics
description: This runbooks gives details about the start time consumed by critical Linux components.

steps.description:
In the first step you get an overview of the boot-up performance of critical components for the specified target system: TARGET

Note: This automation only works on systemd controlled systems.

Get Boot-up Performance

List all services defined on the specified system TARGETin order to check the individual services in next step.

Get Status of all Defined Services

The automation provides you a list and the status of defined services on your system.
It is possible to list startup time for those listed services by updating the service name in the parameter section of the runbook and run the automation in following step.

In case you do not want more details about individual service startup times END

In this step you can check the individual services on the specified system TARGET
